alert.note: Alert for North Bay Interior Mountains; North Bay Interior Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 22 at 3:19PM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Sonoma and western Napa Counties through 345 PM PST... At 318 PM PST, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm over Healdsburg, or 14 miles southwest of Middletown, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. At 318 PM PST, a trained spotter reported pea sized hail and wind gusts up to 30 mph north of Healdsburg. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Santa Rosa, Windsor, Healdsburg, Larkfield-Wikiup, Forestville and Graton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: North Bay Interior Mountains; North Bay Interior Valleys
